description: {"blocks":[{"key":"atp3i","text":"Cryopreservation protocol used during the interlaboratory study published by Mager et al. 2023.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Precultures for Cryo conservation of Synechocystis PCC 6803
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7uocs","text":"Starting from a BG11 agar plate with your strain of interest, inoculate a BG11 liquid culture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5669","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eviju","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4489m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"87ddr","text":"For our BG11 recipe, please refer to our protocol \"BG11_and_inducer_preparation\"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqqjr","text":"Centrifuge cells at 12.000 g (fixed angle rotor) for 15 min and wash in the same volume of fresh BG11 medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Inoculating a culture from Cryo conserved Synechocystis PCC 6803 cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7n71t","text":"Use 330 µL of prepared cryoconserved cells to inoculate a 100 ml flask containing 10 mL of  BG11 medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h7ev","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Precultures for Cryo conservation of Synechocystis PCC 6803
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79bu7","text":"Grow the strain of interest with your settings of choice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cucni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fogq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"uje5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"682hc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":226,"style":"sub"}],"key":"f1s1i","text":"For the interlab study, Synechocystis PCC 6803 was grown in 100 mL Erlenmeyer glass flasks with cotton plugs in shaking incubators set at 100 rpm under 50 µmol photons · m-2  · s-1 constant white light illumination, ambient CO2, and 30°C in BG11 medium. After reaching OD730 of 2, illumination was increased to 80 µmol photons · m-2  · s-1 to account for the high cell density in the flasks.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Precultures for Cryo conservation of Synechocystis PCC 6803
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5umgh","text":"Grow the cells to an OD730 of 2.5-3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cc0l","text":"Centrifuge cells at 12.000 g (fixed angle rotor) for 15 min and resuspend in 10% of the initial volume with BG11 and 15% (v/v) final concentration glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"advh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekqtu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8dbm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ihl5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ii5s","text":"For this, BG11 media was mixed with 50% (v/v) autoclaved glycerol to a 15% (v/v) final concentration glycerol in a ration of 70:30. This does mean that the BG11 is slightly diluted, however we did not observe any impact on the longevity of the conserved cells.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jqdm","text":"Optionally, freeze cells in liquid nitrogen. Store cells at -80°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rcv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pp19","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fht86","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"161bf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"794sk","text":"For the interlab study, cells were frozen in liquid nitrogen and shipped to participating laboratories on dry ice to maintain cryoconservation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Inoculating a culture from Cryo conserved Synechocystis PCC 6803 cells
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0m0s","text":"Cultivate for 48 hours at your settings of choice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fcmq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee8g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o676","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ekqf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":189,"style":"sub"}],"key":"cetuu","text":"For the interlab study, this was done in glass flasks with cotton plugs in shaking incubators set at 100 rpm under 50 µmol photons · m-2  · s-1 constant white light illumination, ambient CO2, and 30°C in BG11 medium.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
